probad.english: A bad workman quarrels with his tools.
A barking dog never or seldom bites.
A beggar cannot be a bankrupt.
A beggar may sing before a pick-pocket.

probad.bangla: অপদার্থ যেখান থেকে শুরু করে সেখানেই ফিরে আসে।
probad.english: A bad penny always turns up.

probad.bangla: হাতের জিনিস ফেলে দূরের জিনিস নিতে নেই।
probad.english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
A bolt from the blue.

probad.bangla: তর্জনকারী বা ষন্ডা সব সময়ই কাপুরুষ।
probad.english: A bully is always a cow.

probad.bangla: ঘর-পোড়া গরু সিন্দুরে মেঘ দেখলে ভয় পায়।
probad.english: A burnt child dreads the fire or Once bitten, twice shy.
A cat has nine lives.
A cat in gloves catches no mice.
A cock is always bold on its own dunghill .
A drawing man catches or clutches at a straw .
A fool and his money are soon parted .
A friend in need is a friend in deed.

probad.bangla: ভাত ছড়ালে কাকের অভাব হয় না।
probad.english: A full purse never lacks friends.
A golden key can open any door.

probad.bangla: স্বামী ভালো হলে স্ত্রীও ভালো হয়।
probad.english: A good jack makes a good jill .

probad.bangla: ঠাকুর ঘরে কে, আমি তো কলা খাইনি।
probad.english: A guilty mind is always suspicious.

probad.bangla: পকেটে টাকা থাকলে মনও ভালো থাকে।
probad.english: A heavy purse makes a light heart.
A host in himself.
A jest driven hard, loses its point.
A king today is a beggar tomorrow.
A little learning is a dangerous thing.

probad.bangla: পাগলে কী না বলে, ছাগলে কী না খায়।
probad.english: A mad man and a animal have no difference.
A man is known by the company he keeps .
A poacher turned gamekeeper .
A rogue is deaf to all good .
A serpent under the flower.
A square peg in a round hole (An Impossibility).

probad.bangla: সময়ের এক ফোঁড় অসময়ের দশ ফোঁড়।
probad.english: A stitch in time saves nine.
A succession of festivities all the year round.
A varice begets sin, sin begets death .
A watched pot never boils .
Adversity often leads to prosperity .

probad.bangla: মেঘ দেখে করিসনে ভয়,আড়ালে তার সূর্য হাসে ।
probad.english: After clouds comes fair weather.
After death comes the doctor .
After meat comes mustard .
All are blaming nobody
Grasp all, lose all
All that glitters is not gold.
All that is old is not bad.
Patience is bitter but its fruit is sweet.
All things come to him who waits .

probad.bangla: সব ভালো তার, শেষ ভালো যার।
probad.english: All well that ends well .
An idle brain is the devil’s workshop .
An ounce of discretion is worth a pound of wit .
An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure .
As is the tree, so is the fruit.
As the wind blows, you must set your sail.
As you sow so you reap.
Avarice begets sin and sin begets death.
Barking dogs seldom bite .

probad.bangla: যার নুন খাও তার গুণ গাও।
probad.english: Be true to your salt.

probad.bangla: দুষ্ট গরুর চেয়ে শূন্য গোয়াল ভালো ।
probad.english: Better alone than in evil company

probad.bangla: একেবারে না হওয়ার চেয়ে দেরিতে হওয়া ভালো ।
probad.english: Better late than never .
Between two fires or Between the devil and the deep sea.
Birds of the same feather flock together.
Birds of the same feather.
Black will take no other hue .

probad.bangla: দাঁত থাকতে দাঁতের মর্যাদা জানে না।
probad.english: Blessings are not valued till they are gone.
Blood is thicker than water.
Blossoms in the dust or Musk in a kennel.
Breed up a crow, and it will pluck your eyes.
Bright gem in a dark cave.
Build castles in the air.

probad.bangla: নিজের নাক কেটে পরের যাত্রা ভঙ্গ করা।
probad.english: Burn not your house to fright the mouse away .
Carry coal to new castle .
Charity begins at home.
Cheap goods are dear in the long run.
Child's plaything.
Childish behavior of an old man .
Civility/courtesy costs nothing .
Count (to) chickens till they are hatched .
Cut your coat according to your cloth.
Danger never comes alone .

probad.bangla: যেখানে বাঘের ভয়, সেখানেই সন্ধ্যা হয়।
probad.english: Danger often comes where danger is feared.
Death defies doctors.
Death keeps no calendar.

probad.bangla: যেমনি বুনো ওল তেমনি বাঘা তেঁতুল ।
probad.english: Desperate diseases must have desperate remedies .
Diamond cuts diamond .
Diligence is the mother of good luck.

probad.bangla: মায়ের কাছে মামা বাড়ির গল্প করো না।
probad.english: Do not teach your grandmother to such egg.
to try one’s utmost.

probad.bangla: এক লাফেই তালগাছে ওঠা যায় না।
probad.english: Don't run before you can walk.
Don't nag me, and leave me in peace.
Don’t count your chickens before they are hatched .
Easier said than done.
Even walls have ears.
Every cloud has silver shining .
Every man is for himself.
Every sin carries its own punishment .
Experience teaches better than wisdom.
Failure is the pillar of success .

probad.bangla: যারে দেখতে নারি, তার চলন বাঁকা ।
probad.english: Faults are thick where love is thin .
Fool to others to himself a sage.
Fortune favors the industrious .

probad.bangla: কাজের সময় কাজী, কাজ ফুরালে পাজী।
probad.english: Get rid of one who has served the purpose.
Give the one, the other will follow .
God helps them who help themselves.
Grease your own wheel or Mind your own business.

probad.bangla: নাই মামার চেয়ে কানা মামা ভাল।
probad.english: Something is better than nothing.

probad.bangla: জাতের মেয়ে কালো ভালো নদীর পানি ঘোলা ভালো ।
probad.english: A man’s action is more important rather than his appearance
He can hardly keep the wolf from the door.

probad.bangla: ভাজা মাছটি উলটে খেতে জানে না।
probad.english: He poses to be quite simple and innocent.

probad.bangla: জীবে প্রেম করে যেইজন, সেইজন সেবিছে ঈশ্বর ।
probad.english: To love the creatures of God is to pray to God
Heaven lies at the foot of mother .
Hide in a superficial way.
Industry is the key to success .
It takes two to make a quarrel or battle.
Living from hand to mouth.

probad.bangla: ভাবিয়া করিও কাজ, করিয়া ভাবিও না।
probad.english: Look before you leap .

probad.bangla: মানুষ জন্মগতভাবে স্বাধীন, কিন্তু সর্বত্রই সে শৃঙ্খলিত।
probad.english: Man is born free but everywhere he is in chain .

probad.bangla: মানুষ বাঁচে তার কর্মে বয়সে নয় ।
probad.english: Man live in deeds not in years .
Many a little makes a mickle .

probad.bangla: দশে মিলে করি কাজ, হারি যিতি নাহি লাজ;
probad.english: Many drops make light work .
Might is right .
Money is the root of all evils.
Necessity is the mother of invention.
Necessity knows no law.
Nero fiddles while Rome burns.

probad.bangla: যার নুন খাও তার গুন গাও ।
probad.english: Be grateful to your patron.
No rose without thorns .
No smoke without fire.
None but a fool is always right .
There is no smoke without fire.
Nothing like force.

probad.bangla: চুরি-বিদ্যা বড় বিদ্যা যদি না পড়ে ধরা।
probad.english: Nothing like stealing if it goes undetected.

probad.bangla: আভাগা যেদিকে চায়, সাগর শুকিয়ে যায়।
probad.english: Once unlucky, always unlucky.
One is punished for another's sin.

probad.bangla: একটা মিথ্যা ঢাকতে দশটা মিথ্যা বলতে হয়।
probad.english: One lie makes many.
One nail drives out another .
Nothing ends for ever.
one’s own things are the best.
Patience has its reward.
Penny wise, pound foolish .

probad.bangla: যা রটে তা কিছু তো বটে।
probad.english: Rumour has some element of truth in it.
Safe bind, safe find .
Silence gives consent.
The most expert person start at last.
Character is the best wealth in a man’s life.
The devil listening to the Scriptures.
The spoilt child of a rich parent.
Look before you leap
